title: #1541 Crazy Atheist Gypsy People
itunes:title: #1541 Crazy Atheist Gypsy People
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing Adam's mom as Drew is surprised to learn that she had a period of her life where she did a lot of international travel on the cheap. They also speak with a caller who wants to discuss how we, as a society, can combat the startling rise in narcissism that we are experiencing. Adam then tells Drew the story of Hannah Tubbs, a story that has not been given widespread coverage, as he examines the language that has to be used when discussing it and what impact that has on people understanding it. As the show wraps up Dr. Drew gets fired up about centralization vs decentralization.
